amendment.description: To require that funds for reconstruction in Iraq be used for certain purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1871 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 47. Record Vote Number: 389.

action.text: Amendment SA 1871 proposed by Senator Bayh. (consideration: CR 10/17/2003 S12688-12708, S12709-12710; text: CR 10/17/2003 S12688-12689) To require that funds for reconstruction in Iraq be used for certain purposes.
